title: [Client] CottonTail Teemo skin (Speckeled) Shows as normal teemo skin While loading

embed.description: When you dash towards Tristana and she blasts you literally across the map with her Buster Shot, this is the place to report it! When there is a problem that occurs within the Client, a patching related issue, or anything that involves gameplay (stuns not working, unintended interactions between a

body:
While loading into a normal game the Cottontail Teemo skin with the Speckled Chroma skin was showing as if I didn't have a skin but it still said i was using cottontail teemo. In the picture above is shown the bug ingame.

Thank you and hope to see this fixed,

xRevision

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're working to get this resolved. :D
